Detailed Description

Packet for asking for covered Maps or Items.

This packet is used to ask for IDs covered by a position and distance from the position or asking for IDs covered by a position from an item and a distance from the position.

If mapID is MAX_UINT32 the position and distance is checked. If the request covers more than one map mapsIDs are returned, otherwise covered items in the map are returned. Otherwise if mapID is not MAX_UINT32, covered items in the map are returned.

After the normal header the request packet contains: {tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & Destription \ REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE & 4 bytes & latitude \ +4 & 4 bytes & longitude \ +8 & 4 bytes & distance \ +12 & 4 bytes & ItemID \ +16 & 2 bytes & Offset \ +18 & 2 bytes & IsItemID or IsLatLon \ +20 & 4 bytes & Inner radius \ +24 & 4 bytes & Start angle \ +28 & 4 bytes & Stop angle \ +32 & 4 bytes & Nbr item types \ +36 & 4 bytes * nbr & item types \ {tabular}

Definition at line 66 of file ServerProximityPackets.h.

Parameters:

itemTypes The item types to return. Empty set means all types.
